short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts a WPI workday schedule to an ICS file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For WPI students to easily import their workday schedules to their preferred calendar app.

To use...
1. Navigate to Workday -> Academics
2. Click "View My Courses" on the right
3. Untick "Turn on the new tables view" on the right side
4. Click "Download ICS" at the top
